+#![deny(dead_code)]
+
+const LOW_RANGE: char = '0';
+const HIGH_RANGE: char = '9';
+
+fn main() {
+    match '5' {
+        LOW_RANGE...HIGH_RANGE => (),
+        _ => ()
+    };
+}
